thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Jeffrey Bachochin

author: Jeffrey Bachochin
title: Jeffrey Bachochin
text:
Lousy return policy. Got penalized 25% for returning a chair that did not match rest of d√©cor in living room. Looked good in show room. The tag is still on it. Will not make that mistake again.
Salesperson was good, though.
